message:
Technology Students’ Gymkhana Presents FRESHERS’ PAINTING COMPETITION on 20th august
(Sunday).
Here is a platform to Explore and show a Artist present within you.
Register yourself @ https://goo.gl/forms/fwTqT1olH7unvzli2
Medium of PAINTING – Water colour/poster colour. Bring your stationery & colours with you.
A2 size sheet will be provided by gymkhana and topic will be given on the spot.
Venue – S-302 , Main building
Time - 3:00PM TO 6:00 PM
For queries contact – 7477737555(Ankit Meena)

Technology Filmmaking and Photography Society is adopting storytellers, writers, photographers, editors and "people beautiful from the inside" in their family. 
There are no absolutely no prerequisites to join the society. 
The auditions/selections are for UG 1st and 2nd years and PG 1st years.
Time: 6 pm Onward
Venue: V-2 Vikramshila (16th August)

Your intangible assets might be of greater value than you realize! How well do you know about your right to protect your own creations of mind?
Do attend the “IPR Workshop: How Intellectual Property impacts life?” on 19th August 2017, 9 a.m. onwards at the Maitrayee Auditorium to know more about the legal rights you hold over the fruits of your intellect.
The sessions will be conducted by the likes of Hon'ble Justice S. Ravindra Bhatt, Prof. V. C. Vivekanandan, Hon'ble Justice Aniruddha Bose, Prof. Imtiaz Gulam Ahmed and Mr. Vineet Rohilla. Each session will be followed by an interactive Q & A session with the speakers.
Safeguard your intellectual properties. Don’t miss out.
Register yourself at tinyurl.com/IPRWorkshop17
Hurry! Limited seats are available.

Participate in the 4th edition of biggest innovation contest organized by KPIT Technologies and stand out as the ultimate pioneer.
All students from 1st year UG till Ph.D. are eligible.
Theme: “Next generation Energy and Transportation solutions” with special focus on: Artificial Intelligence | Cyber Security | New Materials.
Last Date to register is 17th August,2017. Registration is free of cost and get a chance to win awards over INR 21 Lakh.
M N Faruqui Innovations Centre is organizing a workshop, where a representative from KPIT Technologies, Dr. Somnath Sengupta would be present on 21st August,2017. All the enthusiasts are requested to start working on their ideas so that it can be discussed over there. Then venue will be intimidated later.

All the interested students are requested to register on this form: 
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSc3dcl_9un2V6YPMYoUcnimyCPX-luT9MJrGXCUXsj5qpvkLQ/viewform?usp=sf_link

Hola UG 1st Years! Time for Masti, Games and CYCLING!
Technology Adventure Society presents its first event of the year, "Cycle Trip", a chance to explore the campus with us.
Route Gymkhana - > Old building - > RDC - > Helipad - > Hijli forest (camping site). 
Registration starts today (12/8) at Gymkhana Front, from 6:00PM. Be on time as the seats are limited!

Hello everyone,
today after the convocation, one guy(wearing black tshirt)with dslr clicking pics in front of the B.C. Roy statue .. I just lost him in the crowd.. I don't know his name or ph. number..
He was saying this photos will be uploaded in gymkhana site...
Could you please tell me where the convocation photoes will be uploaded??
Give me the link please which will guide me directly to the photo gallery...!!!

Hello everyone,
today after the convocation, one guy(wearing black tshirt)with dslr clicking pics in front of the B.C. Roy statue .. I just lost him in the crowd.. I don't know his name or ph. number..
He was saying this photos will be uploaded in gymkhana site...
Could you please tell me where the convocation photoes will be uploaded??
Give me the link please which will guide me directly to the photo gallery...!!!

story: Technology Students' Gymkhana, IIT Kharagpur shared Business Club, IIT Kharagpur's post.
message: Technology Students' Gymkhana, IIT Kharagpur shared Business Club, IIT Kharagpur's post. Still wondering the strategy to tackle the “Out of the Pit” problem asked during your Induction? Well, we definitely haven't forgotten. Come join us tomorrow to know the answers to many more such questions at the Introductory Seminar of Business Club at Kalidas, 6 pm. See you there! To know more register yourself at: http://tiny.cc/bclubkgp

If you like to think hard, speak your mind and have fun, this is where you need to be on Sunday afternoon. The Debating Society IIT Kharagpur is holding Senior Selections on 30th July 2017, from 2:30 PM onward in F -244. All students who are in or beyond the 2nd Year of their respective disciplines are cordially invited.
The registration link for the same is given below:
http://bit.ly/2uAth9f

IMS Learning Resources is an India-based training company preparing students for entrance examinations for competitive and professional courses. The Institute is conducting a "National Scholarship Test" to expose and encourage you to start your preparations early. Communiqué IIT Kharagpur, in association with IMS Learning Resources, is going to conduct this test in our campus.

The format of the Test:-
Type: Objective Questions (+3/-1)
Sections: Quantitative and Verbal Ability, Reading Comprehension, Data & Logical Reasoning
Time: 90 min

The test is free of cost and every student gets a scholarship from 10% to 100% on Classroom Programs depending on percentile and ranking.

Registration Link - https://goo.gl/forms/1zmnbDd9K6r3KxEo1
Eligibility - 2nd-year UG-5th year UG
Date - 23rd July, Sunday
Reporting time - 1:30 PM
Test Duration - 1.5 hrs ( 2 to 3:30 PM)
Venue - NR121, Nalanda Complex

ON SPOT REGISTRATIONS ARE AVAILABLE

Sections: Quantitative and Verbal Ability, Reading Comprehension, Data & Logical Reasoning
Time: 90 min

The test is free of cost and every student gets a scholarship from 10% to 100% on Classroom Programs depending on percentile and ranking.

IMS Learning Resources is an India-based training company preparing students for entrance examinations for competitive and professional courses. The Institute is conducting a "National Scholarship Test" to expose and encourage you to start your preparations early. Communiqué IIT Kharagpur, in association with IMS Learning Resources, is going to conduct this test in our campus.

The format of the Test:-
Type: Objective Questions (+3/-1)
Sections: Quantitative and Verbal Ability, Reading Comprehension, Data & Logical Reasoning

The test is free of cost and every student gets a scholarship from 10% to 100% on Classroom Programs depending on percentile and ranking.

message: Hei kgpians wake up..The very frist time in kharagpur we r going to creat an acting institute.Where u all can learn the deep base of acting(Characterization,Grooming,Personality devlopment,Mym,Pantomym,Theatrical acting,Stage performance,Performance in Front of camera and lots more) and we r makeing a profesonal theatre repertory team wit our studnts.Very nominal fees tht evreyone can afford ..Free singing classes also.special cares for child artists .for all boys & girls.minimum age 5yrs.for further details call-9002815390,9609211610

Hello Student Entrepreneurs!

This summer, kickstart your startup adventure and take it to the next level with ‘iB Hubs Startup School’, a specially designed 4-week acceleration program with focused learning, expert mentorship, and rapid experimentation.

Best Part: No program fee. Hurry up!!! 

Register now at http://ibhubs.co/startupschool/ and don't forget to tag the Startup Jantha!

Dear Students,

Mr. Anish Reddy, distinguished alumnus of IIT Kharagpur and Co-Founder of Capillary Technologies is visiting the campus today. Capillary Technologies is a software product company, which provides cloud-based Omnichannel Customer Engagement, eCommerce platform and related services for retailers and brands. 

Mr.Anish Reddy is also the founder​ of Technology​ Robotix​ Society and Entrepreneurship Cell IIT Kharagpur.

An interactive session has been planned with them in SN Bose  from 8pm.

Two posts of General Secretary (Students’ Welfare) i.e. 01 male and 01 female is to be created from Autumn Semester 2017-18.
 
Application are invited for the said posts latest by 26th April 2017, to be submitted at T.S.G., Criteria for the posts remain same as for the other G.Sec. posts of TSG.

Submit your applications mentioning your basic details in the main Gymkhana Office to Mr. Prithwiraj Mahto before the deadline.

The Annual Gymkhana Awards Ceremony will be conducted at the Netaji Auditorium from 6.30pm onwards today. All medal winners, award winners and cup winners will be felicitated at the ceremony, and the annual reports will be read out by the outgoing office bearers, as the new office bearers are welcomed into the fold.

Technology Students' Gymkhana, IIT Kharagpur invites the entire student community of IIT Kharagpur to be a part of the proceedings and make this event a success!!
